column5: Hello, I am in the Barrie area and I am looking for ice fishing opportunities on the bay of Quinte for a weekend or two in the new year. I am looking for anyplace that accommodates fishermen with huts and accommodations/bungalows. Is there anything like this on the bay? Any help would be greatly appreciated. Thanks  Victor
Not sure on winter outfitters, but we did some "ice fishing" Monday / Tuesday and Wednesday! Consider this a bump for you..
Check with County Shores south of Deseronto.Â  Pretty sure they still put huts out.
